GLSL (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf69: Execute custom GLSL (OpenGL Shading Language) fragment shaders to generate images or apply effects
GLSL BLEND LINEAR (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\: Simple linear blend between two images
GLSL COLOR CONVERSION (JOV_GL) \ud83e\ud: Convert an image from one color space (RGB, HSV, LAB, XYZ) to another
GLSL COLOR PALETTE (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9: Color palette creation using the formula: color(t) = a + b * cos[tau(c*t+d)]
GLSL CONICAL GRADIENT (JOV_GL) \ud83e\ud: Generate a conical gradient from black to white
GLSL DIRECTIONAL WARP (JOV_GL) \ud83e\ud: Domain warp an image with a direction and distortion map
GLSL FILTER RANGE (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\: Select pixels from start color through end color
GLSL HSV ADJUST (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\ud: Hue, Saturation and Value adjustment control
GLSL INVERT (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\ud83c\: Invert the channels of an image along a scalar [0
GLSL NORMAL (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\ud83c\: Convert input into a Normal map
GLSL POSTERIZE (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\ud8: Reduce the pixel color data range
GLSL TRANSFORM (JOV_GL) \ud83e\uddd9\ud8: Abuse UV space to create repetitions
